full_content: Catmosphere | Devpost Log in Sign up Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Join a hackathon Devpost Participate in our public hackathons Hackathons Projects Devpost for Teams Access your company's private hackathons Login Host a hackathon Devpost Grow your developer ecosystem and promote your platform Host a public hackathon Devpost for Teams Drive innovation, collaboration, and retention within your organization Host an internal hackathon By use case AI hackathons Customer hackathons Employee hackathons Public hackathons Resources Blog Insights into hackathon planning and participation Customer stories Inspiration from peers and other industry leaders Planning guides Best practices for planning online and in-person hackathons Webinars & events Upcoming events and on-demand recordings Help desk Common questions and support documentation Log in Sign up Catmosphere ðŸŒ± cute cats & enemies? cozy vibes? join us at catmosphere! ðŸŒ± Like 2 Comment Story Updates welcome to Catmosphere! we wanted to make a game with (1) cats and (2) cool art. inspired by the many "cozy indie" games on steam and on social media, we got working on a game where the cat has to avoid all the obstacles as it attempts to go into outer space. what it does: use the WASD keys to navigate our cat around the enemies. enter the five levels of the atmosphere and enjoy the art and music while you're at it! what's next for Catmosphere: adding more levels, a restart button, & a new soundtrack and artwork Built With csshtmljavascriptunity Try it out catmosphere-2023.vercel.app Submitted to HackMIT 2023 Winner Beginner Track Winner Created by I worked on creating the 2D vertical endless scroller on Unity! Kenneth Chap Dom D Nigel Norman H De Figueiredo Valente Like 2 2 people like this: Share this project: Updates Dom D started this project â€” Sep 17, 2023 10:09 AM EDT Leave feedback in the comments!
